title: X130B
description_html:
Product Description

Powerful and efficient excavators for all your construction needs. Designed for durability and performance.

  • Increased Efficiency: The rate per minute has been doubled, and even more.
  • Energy Savings: High transmission efficiency benefits from gear reducers.
  • Stable Output: The whole machine has good mechanical rigidity, the equipment stability is improved by more than 90%, and the service life is extended by 3-5 years.
  • Vibration Stability: The vibrating bowl remains stable during operation.
  • User-Friendly Operation: User-friendly workspace, collection of dropping nails.
  • Aesthetical design: The machineâ€™s appearance has been enhanced for visual appeal.
